oracle.spatial.hadoop.rasterapi.core

Class HadoopProperties

  • java.lang.Object
    • oracle.spatial.hadoop.rasterapi.core.HadoopProperties

  • public class HadoopProperties
extends java.lang.Object
    Properties used internally to set the jobs
